advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Watch all of your favorite NBC shows anytime, anywhere for FREE on your iPad, iPhone or iPod Touch - now with AirPlay Mirroring!
 
Watch full-length episodes of NBC's primetime, daytime and late-night hits like The Voice, The Blacklist, About a Boy, The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon and Days of our Lives. New highlight clips and previews from The Tonight Show, Late Night with Seth Meyers and Saturday Night Live are added every day! And with new AirPlay Mirroring, you can browse, swipe and stream all your favorites directly to your TV via Apple TV.
 
FREE FULL EPISODES AND CLIPS
Watch full episodes of the latest NBC shows for free, wherever and whenever you want. Plus now you can watch daily highlights and previews from your favorite late-night shows!
 
CONTINUE WATCHING
Pick up where you left off when returning to an episode you haven't finished watching.
 
FAVORITES
Designate your favorite shows to find and watch the latest episodes and clips quickly.
 
FOLLOW
Tap the Twitter icon on your favorite series to follow that show's official Twitter feed.
 
SHARE 
Let your friends know what you're watching on the app via Facebook, Twitter or email.
 
INTUITIVE SCHEDULE
Keep track of what's airing on NBC tonight - and the rest of the week.
 
SEARCH
Find the episode you're looking for easily.
 
ACCESSIBILITY
NBC is pleased to offer closed captioning support on shows with a "CC" icon in player controls. Just touch to enable.
 
Show and episode availability subject to change. Please note use of the app is limited to the United States and its territories. Video is accessible via 3G, 4G, LTE and WiFi networks. Data charges may apply.
releaseNotes:
* Support for iOS 8
* Various Bug Fixes
